#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll s,e,n;
		cin>>s>>e;
		cin>>n;
		int flag=0;
		while(n--)
		{
			ll a,b;
			cin>>a>>b;
			if((a>s&&a<e) || (b>s&&b<e) || (a<=s&&b>=e))
				flag=1;
		}
		if(flag==0)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
